text: One of the things I really like about Insworld Institute are the small class sizes. It allows the teacher to personally address the concerns and questions of each individual student during classes rather than having to gloss over them. It allows for a closer and more effective student-teacher relationship, which really helps us students in studying for our exams.

I have been to the school.  I am quiet amazed on how a small school  can do so much for the students. Insworld's approach is very different from the other international schools I have been. Everyone knows everyone. zero tolerance on Bullying. ( which I dont know if it even exist there) overall experience is tremendous! Good job Insworld!
Hello Insword institute , I had study in Insword institute 2020.5.4-2020.12.18,although it is only half a year, I am very happy in this school. The teachers are very nice and friendly, thank you.
The Insworld has given our students with confidence, competitive and comfortable enviornment to fulfil their education.
This is a wonderful school with a caring & considerate teaching staff.  Wish that we found this school when we first moved to Singapore.
